name: Minesweeper (Marty)
description: Play my clone of minesweeper, a game where you strategically determine the placement of randomly placed, hidden mines with the help of clues. This game is a good way to pass time. This version of minesweeper includes a dark aesthetic that is pleasing to the eyes, any grid size can be easily chosen by resizing the window, and screen real estate is saved by placing HUD elements in the game. The best part, its free! Download now below.
